Verify the video player is visible, has source 'promo_video.mp4', is initially muted, can toggle to fullscreen mode within 100ms of clicking the fullscreen button, width 960px, height 540px, has a 2px border radius, and playback value is 0.0 seconds initially
Verify the product specifications list displays exactly 5 list items
Verify the 'Processor' item has text 'Processor: Intel i7', font size 15px, color #212529, and padding-left 20px
Verify each list item has a bottom margin of 8px
Open the 'Confirm Deletion' modal
Verify the modal is visible, has opacity 1, width 500px, height 250px, is centered at x: 50%, y: 50% (relative to viewport), background color #ffffff, and border radius 8px
Verify the 'Cancel' button is enabled and has text 'Cancel'
Click the 'Learn More' link

Verify the 'Learn More' link has text 'Learn More', initial color #007bff, font weight 500, aria-label 'Details about our services', becomes focused with a 1px solid blue border colored #0000ff upon click, and its target URL is 'https://example.com/services'
Navigate to the signup form
Verify the 'Password' input field has placeholder 'Min. 8 characters', its value is hidden, and its width is 320px
Verify the 'Sign Up' button is initially disabled, has background color #e9ecef, and displays text 'Sign Up'
Verify the error message 'Password too short' is hidden with opacity 0
Open the 'Category' dropdown

Verify the 'Category' dropdown is visible, the currently selected value is 'Electronics', contains exactly 7 options, the text of the selected option is 'Electronics', has a 1px solid border colored #ced4da, width 200px, and height 38px
Adjust the 'Volume' slider to 75%
Verify the 'Volume' slider's value is 75, width is 250px, height 8px, left position 50px, top position 100px, and its thumb has a circular shape
Verify the 'Volume' slider track's background color is #007bff for the active part and #e9ecef for the inactive part
Initiate file upload
Verify the 'Upload Progress' bar is visible, its width indicates 50% progress, background color is #28a745 for progress and #e9ecef for remaining, border radius 5px, height 10px, and its value is 50%
Verify the 'Cancel' button is enabled
Hover over the 'Help' icon

Verify the tooltip becomes visible within 200ms, displays text 'Contact Support', has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, padding 8px 12px, x-position 20px to the right of the icon, y-position 30px below, and opacity 0.9

Verify the user profile avatar has source 'avatar.jpg', width 60px, height 60px, a circular shape with border radius 50%, alt text 'User Profile Picture', aria-label 'User Settings', is rendered at x: 10px, y: 10px, and has 5px outer spacing on its right
Open the 'Booking Date' date picker

Verify the 'Booking Date' date picker is visible, selected date value is '2023-10-26', has background color #ffffff, 1px solid border colored #cccccc, displayed month text is 'October', year text is '2023', width 280px, and height 240px
View the product carousel
Verify the product carousel contains exactly 3 slides, each with width 800px and height 450px
Verify the current slide is at scroll-left 0px, transitions between slides complete within 500ms with a 'slide' animation, and each slide image has alt text 'Product Slide' and is loaded
Verify each even-numbered row in the data table has a background color #f8f9fa and odd-numbered rows have #ffffff
Verify all cells have 10px padding, font size 14px, and text color #343a40
Verify the 'Status' column is text-aligned 'center' and has a 1px bottom border

Verify the 'New' badge on a product card displays text 'New', has background color #dc3545, text color #ffffff, font size 10px, border radius 3px, padding 4px 8px, top margin 5px, right margin 5px, is visible, and its shape is rectangular
Type 'search term' into the search bar
Verify the search bar's placeholder text is 'Search products...', current value is 'search term', width 400px, height 45px, and has a 1px solid grey border colored #cccccc
Verify the search icon is visible, has an aria-label 'Search', is right-aligned inside the input, with 12px right padding
